Can't Start Game on GBA
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Can't Start Game on GBA
By Speed on Friday, July 23, 2004 - 01:11 pm:

When I turn on my GBA SP to play a saved game, I press "Continue" and the screen just keeps going to "Start" to start a new game. What happened?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, July 23, 2004 - 05:20 pm:

I sounds like the cartridge is defective, or has been abused by being 'overloaded' carelessly too many times. (This is why we don't recommend getting this game used. The game can be ruined by carelessly turning it off an on at the wrong time.) There is a small chance the battery died due to being exposed to too much heat for too long, too. Sorry, looks like you need to find a new copy. The good news, since the game is older, the price is less now.
